Title: Prohibits landlords from using algorithmic devices to set the amount of rent to charge a residential tenant
Summary: Prohibits landlords from using, or contracting for the use of, algorithmic devices to set the amount of rent to charge a residential tenant; imposes additional disclosure requirements regarding a landlord's collection and use of a tenant's personal information.
LawCode: Add ยง344, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the use of algorithmic pricing by a landlord for the purpose of determining the amount of rent to charge a residential tenant
